title: Packs of hyenas hunted Neantherthal man as prey and devoured their corpses in caves, a new find has revealed
content:
1. Packs of hyenas hunted Neantherthal man as prey and devoured their corpses in caves, a new find has revealed  Business Insider
  2. Remains of nine Neanderthals found in cave south of Rome  The Guardian
  3. 'An Extraordinary Discovery': Archeologists Find Neanderthal Remains In Cave Near Rome  Capital Public Radio News
  4. Archaeologists discover remains of nine Neanderthals near Rome  The Washington Post
  5. Remains of nine Neanderthals discovered near Rome  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ハイエナの群れがネアンテルタール人を獲物とし、洞窟の中でその死体を食べていたことが、新たな発見によって明らかになった。
一项新的发现显示，成群的鬣狗把尼安德特人当作猎物，在洞穴中吞噬他们的尸体。
一項新的發現顯示，成羣的鬣狗把尼安德特人當作獵物，在洞穴中吞噬他們的屍體。
